findings.title: Integer Overflow in transfer
findings.explanation: The contract performs `balanceOf[_to] += _value` without any overflow check. If `balanceOf[_to] + _value` exceeds the maximum uint256 value, it will wrap around to a small number, corrupting balances.
findings.fix_suggestion: Use a safe arithmetic library like OpenZeppelin SafeMath for additions, e.g., `balanceOf[_to] = balanceOf[_to].add(_value);`, or add an explicit check that `balanceOf[_to] + _value >= balanceOf[_to]`.
